string.text: You said that you can recharge this flamethrower. Will you do that? I think it needs it.

Yeah, no problem man, you got any fuel? Jeez, don't say that I gotta look for it myself! Listen, this ain't a big deal for me, really, but it's gonna cost 30,000 rubles. And only after a drink, and I mean a REAL drink, got it?
More vodka? You're going to drink the Zone dry. Look for it without me. And just so you know 30,000 rubles isn't even what the flamethrower is worth. Hell with it.
That Vodka will be the death of you. Here's the fuel, and a bottle of the Zones finest. Just make it quick.
Hey I'm not a machine! Gimmie half an hour.
Alright just remember I need it as soon as possible.
I don't have any fuel. Just take 30,000 rubles and some Vodka. But you must work first, drink later, understood?
Well thanks. Don't worry, a day will be enough for this job.
What?! A whole day? You are supposedly a specialist? Maybe in drinking. lol. Later dude.
Exellent! As all parts of my life... take it.
All right thank you! Good man!
Hey don't be so hastey. It is not that simple. Come back some other time!
